Attributes.description: Divergence, gradient, curl, theorems of Gauss and Stokes. Applications to Electrostatics and Magnetostatics. MATH 264 content is strongly coupled to BMEG 220 and ELEC 211 with topics and student evaluations weighted accordingly.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MATH 200, MATH 217, MATH 226, MATH 253, MATH 254.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Neville, Room: Scarfe
